title: Poland’s new rare disease plan stalls at the starting line [Advocacy Lab]
summary_full: Patient advocates warn Poland's 2026 Rare Disease Plan remains stalled without a key oversight council, despite expert calls for urgent action on diagnostics and care coordination
summary_public: Patient advocates warn Poland's 2026 Rare Disease Plan remains stalled without a key oversight council, despite expert calls for urgent action on diagnostics and care coordination

PL.label: neutral
PL.evidence: Poland’s new rare disease plan stalls at the starting line
